page_content:
The Council of the Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science of the Nicolaus Copernicus University is authorized to confer the degree:
* doctor of mathematical sciences in mathematics
* doctor of mathematical sciences in mathematics.

metadata.title: Entitlements
tags: Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science (WMiI)

page_content:
Since the beginning of the classification of scientific units, the Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science at UMK was given the highest category (once A, A+ and Category I).
Currently, the Faculty has a scientific category of A. Among the best university faculties, UMK's WMiI is ranked fifth behind:
* Faculty of Mathematics, Informatics and Mechanics at the University of Warsaw (category A+),
* Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science at Jagiellonian University in Krakow,
* Faculty of Mathematics and Informatics of Adam Mickiewicz University in Pozna≈Ñ,
* Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science at the University of Wroclaw.
